headlines.description: N'Golo Kante's second-half goal gave Chelsea a 1-0 win at Crystal Palace and took them within a point of third-placed Manchester City.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kante goal gives Chelsea victory at Palace

headlines.description: Goals from Chris Wood and Dwight McNeil gave struggling Burnley a much-needed 2-0 Premier League win over West Ham United at Turf Moor on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Burnley end run of defeats with West Ham win

venue.fullName: The Friends Provident St Mary's Stadium

headlines.description: Two goals in the closing moments of the first half gave Manchester City a 3-1 win at Southampton and saw them move back into second place.

video.headline: Southampton 1-3 Manchester City: City survive Saints scare

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlight ( Southampton 1-3 Manchester City: City survive Saints scare) 2018/12/30 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: City back in second with win at Southampton

headlines.description: Paul Pogba scored twice as Manchester United beat Bournemouth 4-1 at Old Trafford to make it three wins from three for Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pogba strikes twice as United win again

video.headline: Manchester United 4-1 Bournemouth: United win in style

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlight (Manchester United 4-1 Bournemouth: United win in style) 2018/12/30 US ONLY
